title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement matthew.warkentin@ucalgary.ca. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla’s code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

what: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: goal dpdr provide programmatic interface Health Canada Drug Product Database API.

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can install development version dpdr GitHub :
code: # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("mattwarkentin/dpdr")

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: 11 API endpoints part Health Canada’s Drug Product Database API. endpoints demonstrated following sections.
code: library(dpdr)

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can search active ingredient information based drug code… based name drug.
code: dpd_ai_id(48905) #> # A tibble: 23 × 6 #>    dosage_unit dosage_value drug_code ingredient_name     strength strength_unit #>    <chr>       <chr>            <int> <chr>               <chr>    <chr>         #>  1 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN A           1250     UNIT          #>  2 ""          ""               48905 BETA-CAROTENE (PRO… 2916     UNIT          #>  3 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN B1          2.25     MG            #>  4 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN B2          3.75     MG            #>  5 ""          ""               48905 NICOTINAMIDE        20       MG            #>  6 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN B6          5        MG            #>  7 ""          ""               48905 D-PANTOTHENIC ACID  10       MG            #>  8 ""          ""               48905 FOLIC ACID          0.2      MG            #>  9 ""          ""               48905 BIOTIN              75       MCG           #> 10 ""          ""               48905 VITAMIN B12         9        MCG           #> # ℹ 13 more rows dpd_ai_name('afatinib') #> # A tibble: 12 × 6 #>    dosage_unit dosage_value drug_code ingredient_name     strength strength_unit #>    <chr>       <chr>            <int> <chr>               <chr>    <chr>         #>  1 ""          ""               90026 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #>  2 ""          ""               90027 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  3 ""          ""               90028 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #>  4 ""          ""              100203 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #>  5 ""          ""              100204 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  6 ""          ""              100205 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #>  7 ""          ""              100391 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #>  8 ""          ""              100392 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #>  9 ""          ""              100393 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG            #> 10 ""          ""              100635 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 20       MG            #> 11 ""          ""              100636 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 30       MG            #> 12 ""          ""              100637 AFATINIB (AFATINIB… 40       MG

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: can search information drug company:

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: family drug product functions allow us query information drug products based drug id drug identification number (DIN). can also find list drugs based drugs product status (see ?dpd_drug_status information). Lastly, can find possible DINs associated drug name.
code: dpd_drug_id(2049) #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   drug_code class_name drug_identification_number brand_name descriptor #>       <int> <chr>      <chr>                      <chr>      <chr>      #> 1      2049 Human      00326925                   SINEQUAN   ""         #> # ℹ 4 more variables: number_of_ais <chr>, ai_group_no <chr>, #> #   company_name <chr>, last_update_date <chr> dpd_drug_din('00326925') #> # A tibble: 1 × 9 #>   drug_code class_name drug_identification_number brand_name descriptor #>       <int> <chr>      <chr>                      <chr>      <chr>      #> 1      2049 Human      00326925                   SINEQUAN   ""         #> # text: can query information package sizes based drug product code.

text: can query status drug product based drug product code.

text: can query Therapeutic Class according drugs main therapeutic use.

text: Lastly, can query species drug product based veterinary drug product code.

title: Interface to Health Canada Drug Product Database API
text: Please note dpdr project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project, agree abide terms.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_ai_id
text: Active Ingredient component medicinal properties, supplies pharmacological activity direct effect diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment prevention disease, affect structure function body human animal.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_ai_id
code: dpd_ai_id(ids)  dpd_ai_name(names)  dpd_ai_all()

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_ai_id
text: ids Vector drug product codes. names Vector active ingredient names.

title: Active Ingredient — dpd_ai_id
text: tibble columns: dosage_unit: Active ingredient dosage unit. dosage_value: Quantitative value active ingredient dosage. drug_code: Code assigned drug product. ingredient_name: Ingredient name. strength: Quantitative value active ingredient strength. strength_unit: Active ingredient strength unit.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_id
text: Basic information product, brand name Drug Identification Number.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_id
code: dpd_drug_id(ids)  dpd_drug_din(dins)  dpd_drug_brand(brands)  dpd_drug_status(statuses)  dpd_drug_all()  dpd_drug_dins(names)

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_id
text: ids Drug product code. dins Drug Identification Number (DIN). brands Brand name. statuses Drug product status. See Details section. names Active ingredient name.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_id
text: tibble columns: ai_group_no: Active Ingredient Group Number. brand_name: Brand name drug product. class_name: Therapeutic class drug product. descriptor: Additional details descriptions product, applicable. drug_code: Code assigned drug product. drug_identification_number: Drug Identification Number. number_of_ais: Number Active Ingredients drug product. company_name: Company name. last_update_date: Date updated time certain, , key fields changed.

title: Drug Product — dpd_drug_id
text: status must integer, corresponding following statuses: 1: Approved 2: Marketed 3: Cancelled Pre Market 4: Cancelled Post Market 6: Dormant 9: Cancelled (Unreturned Annual) 10: Cancelled (Safety Issue)

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: drug assigned one schedules, according Food Drug Regulations, Controlled Drugs Substances Act.

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
code: dpd_schedule(ids)  dpd_schedule_all()

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: ids Vector drug product code.

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: tibble columns: drug_code: Code assigned drug product. schedule_name: Drug schedule according Food Drug Regulations Controlled Drugs Substances Act.

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
text: drug assigned one schedules, according Food Drug Regulations, Controlled Drugs Substances Act. Prescription (prescription drugs included Prescription Drug List) Prescription Recommended (drugs recommended listed Prescription Drug List) Schedule G (control drugs) Schedule G (Controlled Drugs Substances Act (CDSA) III) Schedule G (CDSA IV) Schedule C (drugs listed Schedule C Food Drugs Act, example, radiopharmaceutical drugs) Schedule D (drugs listed Schedule D Food Drugs Act, ie. biological products) Narcotic (Narcotic Control Act) Narcotic (CDSA )S Narcotic (CDSA II) Targeted (CDSA IV) CDSA Recommended- Undergoing Regulatory Amendment add new substance Controlled Drugs Substances Act OTC (counter drugs appear schedule recommended appear schedule) Ethical: drug , accordance Federal Legislation, require prescription, generally prescribed medical practitioner. Ethical products unscheduled non-prescription professional use products (e.g. MRI contrast agents, hemodialysis solutions) emergency use products (e.g. nitroglycerine)

title: Schedule — dpd_schedule
code: dpd_schedule(10687) #> # A tibble: 2 × 2 #>   drug_code schedule_name #>       <int> <chr>         #> 1     10687 Prescription  #> 2     10687 Schedule D
